item.title: [PI] Fix DDS Glitch - Simple
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Okay so this will fix the glitch, where you are doing a dds spec and quickly switch to another weapon to hit a higher dds spec.

[center]Difficulty: 0/1
[size=8pt]Has antileech.[/size]

This is what you need to do, look in your itemHandler class for the following:

Public boolean wearItem

then add

if(targetSlot == 3) { c.usingSpecial = false; addSpecialBar(wearID); }

Then open up CA.class
Then replace your dragon daggers cases with this:c.gfx100(252); c.startAnimation(1062); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.doubleHit = true; c.specAccuracy = 1.30; c.specDamage = 1.05; break; [/center]

Enjoy, Credits 100% - Dell.

Read full topic
